tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE User (id INT, name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE Message (id INT, sender_id INT, receiver_id INT, message_text TEXT, timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE FAQ (id INT, question VARCHAR(255), answer TEXT);

CREATE TABLE user_messages (
    message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    message_text TEXT,
    message_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES bot_users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE faq_questions (
    question_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    category_id UUID,
    question_text TEXT,
    answer_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES faq_categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    feedback_rating INT,
    feedback_comment TEXT,
    feedback_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES bot_users(user_id)
);
